mapper.insert: insert into db_autoaddsalenum (SEQUENCEID, STARTSALENUM, ENDSALENUM, ALERTNUM, PURCHASENUM, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startsalenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{endsalenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alertnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchasenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve6,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update db_autoaddsalenum set STARTSALENUM = #{startsalenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ENDSALENUM = #{endsalenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALERTNUM = #{alertnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PURCHASENUM = #{purchasenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, STARTSALENUM, ENDSALENUM, ALERTNUM, PURCHASENUM, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6 from db_autoaddsalenum where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, STARTSALENUM, ENDSALENUM, ALERTNUM, PURCHASENUM, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6 from db_autoaddsalenum
